features: 【 3.2-inch Screen】: Impressive 3.2-inch super large screen that brings your gaming sessions to life.
【Compact Size】: whether it's to the park, a friend's house, or during travel. The handheld console is designed for gaming anytime, anywhere.
【500 Preloaded Retro Games】: Enjoy a vast collection of 500 original FC games built into, providing a wide range of gaming options and nostalgia-inducing classics.
【Battery Recharge】: Game for hours on end without worrying about running out of power. 1020 mAh battery ensures extended gameplay sessions.
【TV Plug and PlAY】: Connect the console to your TV using the included AV cable and enjoy your favorite games on the big screen for a more immersive experience.
【For Kids and Adults】: Ergonomic grips make it comfortable and easy to hold, even for small hands. Keep everyone entertained, engaged, and honing the gaming skills.
【Perfect Gift】: Perfect gift for father, husband, wife and kids, offering hours of gaming fun and nostalgic enjoyment for the whole family.
body.description: The Player-2 Controller Defines Comfy Ergonomic Design Controller Designed with both style and comfort in mind. Resembling the shape of an apple, this controller offers a sleek and thin profile, making it visually appealing and ergonomic to hold. Perfect Palm Fit With the unic design, you can effortlessly hold the controller using your index finger on the top, providing a perfect fit in the palm of your hand. This grip style ensures comfortable and extended gameplay sessions without strain or discomfort. Smooth like a charm The press buttons on the P2 Game Controller are designed to match the layout of the game console, providing a seamless and familiar gaming experience. Each button offers responsive feedback, allowing for precise control and enjoyable gameplay.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: TimeMax F3 Retro Game Console 3.2-inch Screen The Latest Design Introducing the F3 Retro Game Console! With its bottom grips and ergonomic design, it offers a comfortable handheld gaming experience. The console features a large 3.2-inch TFT full-color screen, providing a vibrant display for your games. 500 Classic Retro Games Built-in Enjoy the crisp and clear sound effects with the console's great quality speaker. With 500 built-in games, you'll have a wide variety of classics and exciting titles to choose from, ensuring hours of entertainment. Super Comfy and Responsive Buttons The super comfy press buttons offer responsive and enjoyable gameplay, allowing for precise control. Plus, the console comes with rechargeable batteries, eliminating the need for constant replacements. Simply recharge and continue gaming on the go. Perfect Option Experience the nostalgia and fun of retro gaming with the F3 Retro Game Console. It's the perfect companion for gaming enthusiasts of all ages, providing a portable and enjoyable gaming experience.

Modle Name F3 Screen Size 3.2-inch HD Battery 1020 mAh Lithium Battery Rechargeable Controller Wired TV Plug and Play Support (AV Cable Connec) Players Support 2 Players Games 500 Original FC Retro Games Charging Time 2 Hours Run Time Up to 5 Hours

The Player-2 Controller Defines Comfy Ergonomic Design Controller Designed with both style and comfort in mind. Resembling the shape of an apple, this controller offers a sleek and thin profile, making it visually appealing and ergonomic to hold. Perfect Palm Fit With the unic design, you can effortlessly hold the controller using your index finger on the top, providing a perfect fit in the palm of your hand. This grip style ensures comfortable and extended gameplay sessions without strain or discomfort. Smooth like a charm The press buttons on the P2 Game Controller are designed to match the layout of the game console, providing a seamless and familiar gaming experience. Each button offers responsive feedback, allowing for precise control and enjoyable gameplay. Features Unique design reminiscent of an apple Comfortable Grip Responsive Buttons Wired Connection Durable Construction Specifically for F3 Console

TV Plug and Play Connected Gaming: Fun with Friends and Family! Immerse yourself in the joy of multiplayer gaming with our TV connectivity feature. Gather your friends and family, connect your game console to the TV, and embark on exciting adventures together. Whether you're competing in friendly matches or joining forces in cooperative gameplay, the shared experience will create lasting memories. Grab your controllers, huddle around the TV, and get ready for hours of laughter, excitement, and quality time with loved ones. It's time to connect and game together like never before! Features Seamless TV Connectivity Multiplayer Fun Shared Entertainment Versatile Gaming Options Social Interaction Enhanced Visuals Convenient and User-Friendly

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 11, 2024
reviews.reviewText: My grandson adores Mario Brothers. He was elated when he got this for Christmas.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 4, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars 500 games is misleading
reviews.reviewText: I got this for my 7-year-old son for Christmas. He always wants to play on the switch but he can be a little destructive so he doesn't get too very often. I figured this was a safe alternative to give him something as his own. That would hopefully have some of the same types of games. It is a nice little handheld game set. Perfect for a small child but saying that there's 500 games is incredibly misleading. There are several games that are repeated multiple times and a lot of the games are ones that I have never even heard of. However, it does have a few classics such as Mario and donkey Kong. I wish that the description had given a better idea of what games were included just so that I knew what to expect seeing Mario. I got excited and was hoping to see he some of the legend of Zelda games, even if only the older ones because he loves those. However, it doesn't seem like this is specific to Nintendo or any other specific gaming system. It just has random games.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 14, 2023
reviews.reviewText: I ordered a black device which I am returning because it was damaged. The replacement came a new it is red. Not what I oredered!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on August 6, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Fun in a Compact Package!
reviews.reviewText: The media could not be loaded. I recently purchased the TimeMax Portable Handheld Game Console, and I must say, it's been an absolute delight. This compact device packs a punch with its impressive collection of 500 preloaded classic retro games. From nostalgic favorites to exciting challenges, there's something for everyone.The 3.2-inch screen provides a crisp and vibrant display, making the gaming experience enjoyable for both kids and adults. The built-in battery is a lifesaver – no need to worry about constantly replacing batteries. It lasts surprisingly long on a single charge.One of the highlights for me is the 2-player controller feature. Connecting it to the TV for multiplayer gaming brings back memories of the good old days, huddled around the screen with friends and family.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 3, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Lots of games
reviews.reviewText: Tons of great games to play. Excellent value for the $

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 30, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 2.0 out of 5 stars Retro vintage outdated
reviews.reviewText: It sounds great 500 retro games at your finger tips .I didn't bother hooking up to the TV because rca jack's not supported .Rechargeable battery with included old style usb jack . No the older mini USB but before that.500 games of which you probably never heard of more then 10There was Tetris but not very playable .Much better games on your phone .Just see no way to recommend.Would not give this as a gift even to a child .

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 22, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Great for traveling or camping, great quality and extra fun with so many games to choose from. Great value and great to have to play on the tv with the added connection. Fix boredom on the longer drives

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 14, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Good, but not great
reviews.reviewText: This is a pretty cool little system. I love the selection of games - far more than I'll ever be able to play! One of my favorites of course is Super Mario and though it looks great, the game play is slightly off.The original NES only had an A and B button, and this has four buttons - labelled A, B, X, and Y. When playing Super Mario on this system, both A and B function as jump buttons, but only A works the same as it did on NES, allowing both a short and high jump. If you push the B button on this system, you can only do a short jump, not the long jump, which is pretty important with Super Mario. I don't understand why A and B both allow you to jump, but don't function the same.I also used to love Contra and found that it plays well, but I did try the classic cheat code (up-up-down-down-left-right-left-right-B-A-start) to get 30 extra lives and it didn't work. Contra is extremely difficult to beat without that cheat code.The other issue I had is that my controller doesn't work. I got this connected to my TV, but can't get the extra controller to do anything, which means I have to be within about 8 feet of my TV to use this on the big screen, which is too close for me to sit on the couch and play.Overall, the system is good, but there are a few flaws with it. I'd recommend it to those who plan to use it only as a handheld system and not hooked up to a TV.
